thread.section_title: Biz2Credit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biz2Credit | biz2credit.com
thread.title: Jesse Corazza

author: Jesse Corazza
title: Jesse Corazza
text: Ron Klayman is a true professional. Ron handled our negotiations in an extremely expeditious manner. Always returned phone calls, emails and text messages within minutes. Ron and his staff all worked in conjunction with each other to get us approved in less than a few days. Everyone was courteous, professional, polite and very much willing to answer any questions my company had. The underwriters were extremely accommodating and efficient. Even the woman who came in to take the pictures of our facility was enthusiastic, complimented us on our facility and overall business. I would highly recommend Biz2Credit to any business that is in need of capital to help grow to however big they want to be. i could not be happier. Thank you Ron and the whole Biz2Credit organization from top to bottom.
